sentence.Network_en: The inves-tigation was undertaken primarily to mollify pressure groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 展开调查主要是为了安抚那些压力集团。

sentence.Network_en: She managed to mollify her angry boss.
sentence.Network_cn: 她顺利平息了她生气的老板.

sentence.Network_en: Say something to mollify his anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 你去解劝几句,叫他别生气了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... mollify 缓和>激怒 mollify 平息>唤醒，唤起 monotonous 单调的>花斑的.

list.abs: She managed to mollify her angry boss ., 她顺利平息了她生气的老板.
... ◆ 消磨[  wear down fritter away ] ◆ 消气[ cool down mollified ] ◆ 消遣[  divert oneself while away the time ].
XY : look , you whiney crybaby , we're not wasting the element of surprise to mollify your nyctophobia .听着，你这个瞎抱怨的爱哭鬼，我们可不会为了迁就你的黑夜恐惧症而浪费出其不意这一要素。
She managed to mollify the angry customer ., 她设法安抚这位愤怒的客户.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'make soft or supple'): from French mollifier or Latin mollificare, from mollis 'soft'

entry.def: If you mollify someone, you do or say something to make them less upset or angry.

example.ex: The investigation was undertaken primarily to mollify pressure groups.
example.tran: 展开调查主要是为了安抚那些压力集团。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to be more favorably inclined; gain the good will of;

sentences.sentence: "She managed to mollify the angry customer"

means.word_mean: 2. make more temperate, acceptable, or suitable by adding something else; moderate;

auth_sentence.content: This is clearly meant to mollify critics.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is clearly meant to mollify critics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is clearly meant to mollify critics.

auth_sentence.content: Throughout, Rucker's velvety voice manages to both mollify and add a sinister dimension to the harshness of her subject matter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Throughout, Rucker's velvety voice manages to both mollify and add a sinister dimension to the harshness of her subject matter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Throughout, Rucker's velvety voice manages to both mollify and add a sinister dimension to the harshness of her subject matter.

sentences.en: He tried to find ways of mollifying her.
She managed to mollify her angry boss.
sentences.cn: 她顺利平息了她生气的老板。
